definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
concert held at a real estate development site to attract home buyers (Tw)

sentences.english: Construction cranes clutter the skylines of booming Chinese cities.
sentences.chinese: 繁荣城市的工地上起重机闹哄哄。

sentences.english: We disclaim all liability for all materials on your site.
sentences.chinese: 我们免除所有责任都在你们工地材料。

sentences.english: Following the sound, he found a construction site.
sentences.chinese: 他循声跑过去，来到一处建筑工地。

sentences.english: We are almost on the worksite now.
The Permit Holder shall provide portable toilet for the on- site construction workforce.
sentences.chinese: 许可证持有人须为驻工地建筑工人提供流动洗手间。

sentences.english: The workers were brewing up in a sheltered corner of the building-site.
sentences.chinese: 工人们在建筑工地的避风处泡茶喝。

sentences.english: A construction worker pushes a plank which boards up to enclose the building site in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 上海，建筑工人托起木板，封住工地。

sentences.english: Residents Liu used cell phone cameras to the video of the construction site at night.
sentences.chinese: 居民刘军用手机拍摄到了工地夜间施工的视频。

sentences.english: He ran towards the sound and stopped at a construction site.
sentences.chinese: 他循着声音跑过去，来到一处建筑工地。

sentences.english: Upon his arrival at the worksite , he began to work.
sentences.chinese: 他已到工地，马上就投入了工作。

sentences.english: I took 3 from the site faster bricks together began to move.
sentences.chinese: 我从工地上拿了3快砖头放在一起就开始搬了。

sentences.english: Construction workers erecting an apartment complex thought he might have worked there.
sentences.chinese: 建筑工地的建筑工人也认为何文曾在那里工作过。

sentences.english: A new work shed has been set up near the construction site.
sentences.chinese: 在建筑工地的旁边新盖了一栋工房。

sentences.english: He was annoyed at the noise from the construction site in the midnight.
sentences.chinese: 他讨厌深更半夜从建筑工地上传来的噪音。

sentences.english: If no one goes to your site, it hardly bares a chance of generating an income.
sentences.chinese: 如果你没有人去工地，几乎暴露机会发挥效益。

sentences.english: Emergency car left the site, only to enjoy the car window Xianxin scene.
sentences.chinese: 有事坐车离开工地，才有闲心欣赏车窗外的景致。

definition: construction/to carry out construction or large-scale repairs
migrant worker/temporary worker enlisted on a public project
to stop work/to shut down/to stop production
temporary housing built with wooden planks or other makeshift materials
